name: UIScene.ConnectionOptions
desc: A data object containing information about the reasons why UIKit created the scene.

items.name: var userActivities: Set<NSUserActivity>
items.desc: Information about user activities that you can use to configure your scene's interface.

items.name: var urlContexts: Set<UIOpenURLContext>
items.desc: The URLs to open, along with metadata specifying how to open them.

items.name: var handoffUserActivityType: String?
items.desc: The type of the pending Handoff activity.

items.name: var cloudKitShareMetadata: CKShareMetadata?
items.desc: Information about the CloudKit data that is now available to the app.

items.name: var notificationResponse: UNNotificationResponse?
items.desc: The user's response to one of your app's notifications.

items.name: var sourceApplication: String?
items.desc: The bundle ID of the app that originated the request.
